TEXT.TITLE: FOREST CITY <FECA> COMPLETES SALE
TEXT.BODY: Forest City Enterprises Inc said it completed the previously announced sale of assets of its retail store division, excluding real estate, to Handy Andy Home Improvement Centers Inc, a private Gurnee, Ill., firm. The sale is for cash and notes but exact terms were not disclosed. Reuter
